enumValues.description: Beta: Manifest will be selected from the triggering application manifest

enumValues.name: LAST_COLLECTED
enumValues.description: Beta: Last collected Manifest for the service will be selected

enumValues.name: LAST_DEPLOYED
enumValues.description: Beta: Last succesfully deployed Manifest from the workflow/pipeline for the service will be selected

fields.description: Removes Git Sync Configuration associated with an application. Returns updated application.

fields.name: resumeExecution
fields.description:
Resume a unsuccessful pipeline. Any stage which was started (both successful/unseccessful) can be given
 to resume. Pipeline is resumed in block of parallel groups. i.e if given stage has parallel stages all will be
 restarted.

types.name: ServiceTagAggregation
types.description: Aggregate by Service tag

inputFields.name: entityType
inputFields.description: Set entity type

inputFields.name: tagName
inputFields.description: Set tag name

inputFields.name: appId
inputFields.description: Unique ID of the artifact stream

inputFields.name: duration
inputFields.description: Input the duration in milliseconds only when 'isDurationBased' is 'true'.

inputFields.name: expiryTime
inputFields.description: Input expiry time of the deployment freeze window if 'untilForever' is selected as 'false'.

inputFields.name: freezeOccurrence
inputFields.description: Input the frequency for a recurring deployment freeze window. If not recurring leave it be null.

inputFields.name: from
inputFields.description: Input the start time of the freeze only when 'isDurationBased' is 'false'.

inputFields.name: isDurationBased
inputFields.description: Input 'true' for Duration-Based deployment freeze windows else 'false' for Schedule-Based deployment freeze windows.

inputFields.name: timeZone
inputFields.description: Input a valid region based ID for time zone. Eg. Asia/Calcutta

inputFields.name: to
inputFields.description: Input the end time of the freeze only when 'isDurationBased' is 'false'.

inputFields.name: untilForever
inputFields.description: Input 'true' for running this Scheduled-Based freeze window forever(max 5 Years from now) else input 'false' and enter the expiry time for the window.

types.name: SortOrder
types.description: This data structure will be useful for bar charts which are aggregated over a period of time

inputFields.name: applicationId
inputFields.description: Application identifier of a Workflow or Pipeline

inputFields.name: continueWithDefaultValues
inputFields.description: Beta: Continue with default values in case of pipelines with runtime variables

inputFields.name: entityId
inputFields.description: Entity identifier of a Workflow or Pipeline

inputFields.name: excludeHostsWithSameArtifact
inputFields.description: Skip deployment on the host, if the same artifact is already deployed

inputFields.name: executionType
inputFields.description: Workflow or Pipeline

inputFields.name: notes
inputFields.description: Execution notes

inputFields.name: serviceInputs
inputFields.description: Service inputs required for the execution

inputFields.name: specificHosts
inputFields.description: List of hostnames, if targeted to a specific host

inputFields.name: targetToSpecificHosts
inputFields.description: Set to true if the deployment target is specific hosts. Provide specificHosts field along with this.

inputFields.name: variableInputs
inputFields.description: Variable inputs required for the executio

fields.name: warningMessage
fields.description: Get This field to know if there are any Warnings/Messages but the execution can be started successfully. For Example in case of user providing extra inputs.

inputFields.description: Specify the repository name. If your Harness Source Repo Provider uses the Git Account type, provide the Repo Name to use from that account.

inputFields.name: areWebHookSecretsMandated
inputFields.description: Beta: When this WebhookSecrets flag is set to true for an application, webhook secrets are mandated for github triggers.

inputFields.name: isManualTriggerAuthorized
inputFields.description:
Beta: When this is set to true, all manual triggers will require API Key authorization.
 Doc link: https://docs.harness.io/article/mc2lxsas4c-trigger-a-deployment-using-c-url#option_enforce_api_keys_for_manual_triggers

fields.description: Default value, Only for text variables

inputFields.description: Bitbucket  event, Required if webhookSourceType = BITBUCKET

inputFields.description: Branch in which the filePaths exist.

inputFields.name: branchRegex
inputFields.description: Branch filter, can be used if using PullRequest or Push events.

inputFields.name: deployOnlyIfFilesChanged
inputFields.description: Only for Native Helm and Helm-based Kubernetes deployments. Event type should be PUSH.

inputFields.name: filePaths
inputFields.description: The file names/paths when changed and Pushed, will execute this Trigger.

inputFields.description: Source Repo Provider setup in Harness

inputFields.description: Github event, Required if webhookSourceType = GITHUB

inputFields.name: gitlabEvent
inputFields.description: Gitlab  event, Required if webhookSourceType = GITLAB

inputFields.name: repoName
inputFields.description: Git repository name in case when Account level Git connector is provided

inputFields.name: webhookSecret
inputFields.description: Beta: Webhook secret to authorize Github webhooks

inputFields.name: webhookSourceType
inputFields.description: Source of the webhook: GITHUB/GITLAB/BITBUCKET/CUSTOM(curl based)

inputFields.name: headers
inputFields.description: Custom headers

inputFields.name: url
inputFields.description: HTTP Endpoint

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: An enum describing valid locations where a directive can be placed

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a field argument SDL definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an enum SDL definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an enum value SDL definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fields.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a field SDL definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fragment definitions.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fragment spreads.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on inline fragments.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an input object field SDL definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an input object SDL definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an interface SDL definition.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on mutations.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an object SDL definition.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on queries.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a scalar SDL definition.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a schema SDL definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an union SDL definition.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Introspection defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: 'A list of all directives supported by this server.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: 'If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given __Type is

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if`'argument is true.

directives.name: defer
directives.description: This directive allows results to be deferred during execution

directives.name: dataFetcher
directives.description:
